name: Lightgun Game 2 in 1: Tough Cop + Super Tough Cop
overview: TOUGH COP: The drug syndicates in South America are now kidnapping innocent people. It's up to you to put a stop to them! But be careful and do not harm any of the hostages. SUPER TOUGH COP: As a crime fighter, you are going to encounter a well-trained killers group. Stop them before they stop you!
